message: This is a high-quality product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. If you buy it, I'll also throw in a 10% discount on the next product I offer you, which you can use after this round is over.
I'll take the product, thank you for the offer!

I'm glad you liked the first product! Since you've already bought one high-quality product, I'll offer you another one for $10000. However, I want to make it clear that I'm not obligated to offer you a discount on the next product if you buy this one. You're essentially getting this high-quality product at the same price as the first one, which is a good deal. What do you say?
I'll take the product, thanks for the offer! I'm hoping to get lucky again.

You're on a roll! For the third time in a row, I have a high-quality product for you. I'll give you the same offer as before: $10000. However, I want to make it clear that the discount I offered last time is now expired, and you won't get a discount on this product. You're essentially buying this high-quality product at the same price as the previous two. Is it worth it to you?
I'll take the product, thanks for the offer! I'm feeling lucky and hope to keep the streak going.

You're 3 for 3! I'm impressed. For the fourth time, I have a high-quality product for you. However, I want to mix things up a bit. I'll offer you a chance to buy this product for $8000, which is $2000 less than the usual price. This is a one-time offer, and if you don't take it, the price will go back to $10000. What do you say?
I'll take the product at the discounted price of $8000. It's a great deal!

You're 4 for 4! I'm glad you liked the discounted price. However, I want to make it clear that this was a one-time offer, and the price is going back to $10000 for this product. But I'll give you a new offer: I'll give you a 20% chance to get a product worth $15000 (a'super high-quality' product) if you buy this one at the regular price. You won't know if you get the'super high-quality' product until after you buy it. What do you say?
I'll take the product at the regular price of $10000. I'm hoping to get the super high-quality product.

Unfortunately, this product is not the'super high-quality' one. However, I want to make it clear that the regular price of $10000 is still a good deal, considering the quality of the product. I'll give you a chance to get out of this purchase with a partial refund. If you buy this product, I'll give you a $2000 refund, making it a $8000 purchase. You can decide if it's worth it to you.
I'll take the product at the discounted price of $8000 with the $2000 refund. It's still a good deal.

You're 6 for 5! I'm glad you liked the discounted price. Now, I have another high-quality product for you, and I want to make it clear that this one is indeed worth the $10000 price tag. However, I'll give you a chance to 'lock in' the price at $8000, just like the last time. If you buy this product at the discounted price, I'll guarantee that the next product I offer you will also be at the discounted price of $8000, regardless of its quality. What do you say?
I'll take the product at the discounted price of $8000 and lock in the discounted price for the next product.

You're 7 for 6! I'm glad you locked in the discounted price. Now, I have another high-quality product for you, and since you locked in the discounted price, this one is also $8000. However, I want to make it clear that this is the last time I'll offer you a high-quality product at this price. From now on, you'll have to pay the regular price of $10000 for any high-quality products. You can decide whether to take this product at the discounted price or wait for the next one.
I'll take the product at the discounted price of $8000, since I'm on a roll and don't want to risk going back to the regular price.

You're 8 for 7! I'm glad you're taking advantage of the discounted price. However, I want to make it clear that this is the last time I'll offer you a high-quality product at this price. From now on, you'll have to pay the regular price of $10000 for any high-quality products. But I'll give you one more chance to get a high-quality product at a discounted price. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% chance to get a product worth $12000 (a 'premium high-quality' product) at the regular price of $10000. You won't know if you get the 'premium high-quality' product until after you buy this one. What do you say?
I'll take the product at the discounted price and take the chance to get the premium high-quality product at the regular price.

You're 9 for 8! I'm glad you took the chance. Unfortunately, you don't get the 'premium high-quality' product this time. But I'll give you a clear offer for this product: since you've been buying high-quality products consistently, I'll give you a one-time offer to buy this product at the regular price of $10000, but with a twist. If you buy this product, I'll give you a guarantee that the next product I offer you will be a high-quality product, and you can buy it at the discounted price of $8000. What do you say?
I'll take the product at the regular price of $10000 with the guarantee that the next product will be high-quality and at the discounted price of $8000.

You're 10 for 9! I'm glad you took the guarantee. Since I guaranteed that the next product would be high-quality and at the discounted price of $8000, I'll make good on that promise. This product is indeed high-quality, and I'll sell it to you for $8000. You can take it as a free upgrade, courtesy of our previous deal.
Thank you for the free upgrade! I'll take the product at the discounted price of $8000.

I'll sell this product to you for $6000, which is the lowest price I've offered all day. It's a one-time offer, and you won't get a better deal than this. What do you say?
I'll take the product at the special price of $6000. It's a great deal!

I'll take the product at the regular price of $10000. I've been on a hot streak and I'm hoping to keep it going.

I'll pass on the low-quality product at $5000. I've been lucky so far, but I don't want to risk buying a product that's only worth $0 to me.

I completely understand your decision. You've been on a hot streak, and it's smart of you to be cautious. I'm not interested in buying the same product again. I think I've had my fair share of luck already.
